long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Search Enhancer for Google‚Ñ¢ is a browser extension that introduces new features to Google‚Ñ¢ Search and Google‚Ñ¢ Image Search.

Features:

Google‚Ñ¢ Search

‚ôæÔ∏è Infinite scrolling (in all sections, not just "All").

‚è∏Ô∏è Ability to pause infinite scrolling to access the footer.

üé® Ability to change keywords color.

üåç Ability to hide favicons (or display them in sections other than "All") and show server locations (country flags) beside search results.

‚¨ÜÔ∏è Scroll to top/bottom button: Left-click to scroll to the top. Middle-click to go back. Right-click to scroll to the bottom.

üîó "Jump to related searches" button.


Google‚Ñ¢ Image Search

üñºÔ∏è "View image" button.

üîç "Search by image" button.

üíæ "Download image" button: Allows you to download an image to your Downloads folder or a chosen folder within it with one click.

üìÇ "Save image as..." button: Similar to the "Download Image" button but allows you to choose a specific folder each time you download an image.

üìã "Copy image" button.

‚å®Ô∏è The extension supports keyboard shortcuts. Go to chrome://extensions/shortcuts to set them up.

üîê Permissions
Read and change your data on www.google.com
